Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கடன்என்ப நல்லவை எல்லாம் கடன்அறிந்துசான்றாண்மை மேற்கொள் பவர்க்கு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: All goodly things are duties to the men, they say Who set themselves to walk in virtue's perfect way.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person of perfect goodness ('Saandraanmai') stands at the center of a radiating mandala of virtues. Their hands are open, not as if performing a single charity, but as if embracing all good actions as their natural duty.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The mandala is composed of glowing symbols representing all good things ('Nallavai Ellam'): helping the needy, speaking truth, showing compassion, etc. These are not depicted as choices but as interconnected parts of a whole.
Layered_Composition.Background: A serene, harmonious world that seems to be a direct result of this person's virtuous nature. The sun shines brightly, nature is in balance.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual representation of a 'Saandror' (perfected one) for whom every good act is not an occasional choice but a fundamental, natural duty ('Kadan').
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The mandala of virtues is the key symbol, showing all good deeds as an integrated part of their being. Their open, embracing posture signifies acceptance of this duty.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, pure, golden-white light emanates from the person and the mandala, illuminating the entire scene. The palette is clean and vibrant, with divine golds, whites, and sky blues.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Centered medium shot, eye-level, creating a direct and reverent connection with the subject.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, mystical realism, with intricate, glowing details in the virtue mandala.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Radiant, internal, volumetric lighting that feels divine and all-encompassing.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Spiritual or mystical art, blending realistic portraiture with symbolic iconography.

Negative_Prompt: dark, gloomy, struggling figure, isolated symbols, modern context, text artifacts, deformed limbs.
